org.glite.authz.pep.profile
Class AbstractAuthorizationProfile

java.lang.Object
  org.glite.authz.pep.profile.AbstractAuthorizationProfile
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorizationProfile, Profile
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonXACMLAuthorizationProfile, GridCEAuthorizationProfile, GridWNAuthorizationProfile
public abstract class AbstractAuthorizationProfile
extends Object
implements AuthorizationProfile

Base authorization profile containing helper methods to build request and parse response.

getObligation

public Obligation getObligation(Response response,
                                int decision,
                                String obligationId)
                         throws ProfileException
Description copied from interface: AuthorizationProfile
Gets the obligation identified by id from the response for a given decision.

Specified by:
getObligation in interface AuthorizationProfile
Parameters:
response - the response to process
decision - the decision to match
obligationId - the obligation id to match
Returns:
the matching obligation
Throws:
ProfileException - if the response doesn't contain the result for the decision, or obligation matching the id.

                             String resourceid,
                             String actionid)
                      throws ProfileException
Description copied from interface: AuthorizationProfile
Creates a Request with the given end entity X.509 certificate or proxy (with its chain), the resource-id and the action-id.

createRequest in interface AuthorizationProfile
Parameters:

a new request
Throws:
ProfileException - if the a certificate can not be read

                                     throws ProfileException
Description copied from interface: AuthorizationProfile
Gets the posix env map Obligation from the result with a Permit decision

Specified by:
getObligationPosixMapping in interface AuthorizationProfile
Parameters:
response - the response to process
Returns:
the POSIX mapping obligation, with decision Permit
Throws:
ProfileException - if no decision Permit or no POSIX mapping obligation is found.

getAttributeAssignmentUserId

public String getAttributeAssignmentUserId(Obligation posixMappingObligation)
                                    throws ProfileException
Description copied from interface: AuthorizationProfile
Gets the mandatory POSIX user-id (login name) from the posix env map Obligation

Specified by:
getAttributeAssignmentUserId in interface AuthorizationProfile
Parameters:
posixMappingObligation - the posix mapping obligation
Returns:
the POSIX login name to map
Throws:
ProfileException - if the obligation is not a posix env map , or if the mandatory user-id attribute assignment is not contained in the obligation, or if the user-id login name is empty or null.

getAttributeAssignmentGroupIds

public List<String> getAttributeAssignmentGroupIds(Obligation posixMappingObligation)
                                            throws ProfileException
Description copied from interface: AuthorizationProfile
Gets the list of POSIX group-ids (group names) from the posix env map Obligation

Specified by:
getAttributeAssignmentGroupIds in interface AuthorizationProfile
Parameters:
posixMappingObligation - the posix mapping obligation
Returns:
list of POSIX group names, can be empty if the group-id attribute assignments are not contained in the obligation.
Throws:
ProfileException - if the obligation is not a posix env map

getAttributeAssignmentPrimaryGroupId

public String getAttributeAssignmentPrimaryGroupId(Obligation posixMappingObligation)
                                            throws ProfileException
Description copied from interface: AuthorizationProfile
Gets the POSIX primary group-id (group name) from the posix env map Obligation

Specified by:
getAttributeAssignmentPrimaryGroupId in interface AuthorizationProfile
Parameters:
posixMappingObligation - the posix mapping obligation
Returns:
the POSIX group name, can be null if the attribute is not contained in the obligation.
Throws:
ProfileException - if the obligation is not a posix env map
